PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国进口夏威夷皇家有机圣诞莓（Christmas Berry）蜂蜜 ¥75.00  美国进口夏威夷皇家有机Lehua蜂蜜 ¥75.00  美国原装进口80 Acres …

means.word_mean: 1. spiny evergreen shrub of southeastern United States having spreading branches usually blue or mauve flowers and red berries
2. ornamental evergreen treelike shrub of the Pacific coast of the United States having large white flowers and red berrylike fruits; often placed in genus Photinia
